source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_SEQ_00<tab>J'olhmyn is more than ready to set to tracking Nhaza'a Jaab across the sea.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_SEQ_00<tab>J'olhmyn est prête à partir à la poursuite de Nhaza'a Jaab.

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_SEQ_01<tab>You speak with J'olhmyn, who has little patience for delays─particularly those that come in the form of M'zhet. She dashes off toward the Ruby Price almost the instant you suggest it as a likely spot to find eyewitnesses, leaving him struggling to keep up.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_SEQ_01<tab>J'olhmyn est bien décidée à retrouver Nhaza'a Jaab le plus vite possible. Allez la rejoindre aux Batteries de Rubis.

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_SEQ_02<tab>You meet with J'olhmyn and M'zhet, the latter of whom seems to have recovered his senses, if not his good sense. As time is of the essence, the former suggests that the three of you split up to more efficiently speak with those manning the Ruby Price and search for any other clues that may be present in the vicinity.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_SEQ_02<tab>Vous avez retrouvé J'olhmyn et M'zhet Tia aux Batteries de Rubis. Interrogez les gardes postés alentour pour savoir s'ils ont aperçu Nhaza'a Jaab.

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_SEQ_03<tab>Though you speak with several people zealously undertaking their duties at the Ruby Price, they assure you that no one matching Nhaza'a Jaab's description has passed through the area. Disappointing though the result may be, it at least narrows the range of potential routes he may have taken across the Ruby Sea.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_SEQ_03<tab>Malgré vos efforts, vous n'avez pas réussi à obtenir d'in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions au sujet de Nhaza'a Jaab. Allez retrouver J'olhmyn pour voir si elle a eu plus de chance que vous.

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_SEQ_04<tab>Midway through reporting the results─or notable lack thereof─of your investigation to J'olhmyn, you hear M'zhet's scream ring through the salty air. Rushing to its source, you find him being menaced by none other than Kabuto, who has evidently mistaken him for the man who stole Tsukumo─or rather, the materia that once was the kami's soul─right from the Kojin's helmet. Thankfully, your presence causes him to realize his error sooner rather than later, and the initial misunderstanding is soon forgotten. As it appears that the one who purloined Tsukumo and Alpa's kidnapper are one and the same, Kabuto eagerly joins you in your continued search for Nhaza'a Jaab.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_SEQ_04<tab>Alors que vous parliez avec J'olhmyn, vous avez entendu M'zhet Tia hurler. En accourant à son secours, vous avez retrouvé Kabuto. Ce dernier a accepté de vous aider à retrouver Nhaza'a Jaab pour récupérer son précieux Tsukumo. Rendez-vous à Isari et parlez à J'olhmyn pour poursuivre votre traque.

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_SEQ_05<tab>On Kabuto's recommendation, you make your way to the fishing village of Isari, again in search of eyewitnesses. Perhaps your inquiries will bear more fruit this time around.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_SEQ_05<tab>Vous avez retrouvé vos compagnons à Isari. Enquêtez auprès des villageois pour tenter d'obtenir des in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions au sujet de Nhaza'a Jaab.

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_SEQ_06<tab>Upon questioning, one of the villagers claims to have seen a man with the characteristics you describe. Though he was apparently not accompanied by a mermaid, given the rarity of Miqo'te in the Far East and the man in question's peculiar fashion sense, it is all but certain that Nhaza'a Jaab indeed passed through Isari, and thereafter headed for either the Azim Steppe or Yanxia. Though the other fisherfolk can provide you with no additional information as to the villain's whereabouts, one man does mention a curious legend of potential note─that of the Three Wonders. According to the fisherman, these mythical treasures─which include the flesh of a mermaid─have been the subject of much gossip of late, as a certain noble lady has made their provision a requirement of those who would claim her hand in marriage.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_SEQ_06<tab>En interrogeant les villageois, vous avez appris que Nhaza'a Jaab était passé par Isari mais qu'il était sûrement déjà parti du côté de la Steppe d'Azim ou de Yanxia. Vous avez aussi entendu parler des trois trésors légendaires de Kugane, dont l'un serait un morceau de chair de sirène... Allez retrouver J'olhmyn sur la plage pour partager vos découvertes.

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_SEQ_07<tab>As you discuss your findings with your companions, Kabuto reveals that he is familiar with folklore regarding the Three Wonders, and that, in addition to Merflesh, the Jewel of Fair Souls and the Philosopher's Fin are counted among their number. He and J'olhmyn theorize that, due to Alpa's oft-remarked-upon resemblance to a mermaid of Far Eastern legend and Tsukumo's rare nature, it may be possible to pass them off as two of the three treasures to a gullible recipient. What Nhaza'a Jaab's ultimate goal in doing so might be remains shrouded in mystery, but if he is indeed collecting counterfeits of the Wonders, it is imperative that Alpa be rescued before her flesh can be separated from her person.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_SEQ_07<tab>En parlant avec vos compagnons, vous avez établi un lien entre Nhaza'a Jaab et les trois trésors légendaires de Kugane. Le joyau dérobé à Kabuto serait l'un d'eux, et Alpa aurait été enlevée pour sa chair de... sirène<var 1D /var>? Alors que M'zhet Tia commence à s'imaginer des scènes d'horreur, J'olhmyn est plus que jamais décidée à arrêter Nhaza'a Jaab avant qu'un drame se produise.

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_TODO_00<tab>Speak with J'olhmyn at the Ruby Price.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_TODO_00<tab>Parler à J'olhmyn, aux Batteries de Rubis

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_TODO_01<tab>Speak with potential eyewitnesses at the Ruby Price.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_TODO_01<tab>Recueillir des in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_001<tab>Grrr... Just wait till I get my hands on that Nhaza'a Jaab! At least we have some idea where he's heading with Alpa, thanks to M'zhet.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_001<tab>Ce Nhaza'a ne perd rien pour attendrrre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_002<tab>I've decided to reward him by not pushing him into the sea, even though he's making it so very tempting. More importantly, where do you reckon we should start our search?
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_002<tab>D'après M'zhet, il est parrrti sur la Mer de Rubis. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, avez-vous une idée de sa destination<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_003<tab>They likely passed by the Ruby Price? Well, what are we waiting for?
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_003<tab>Les Batteries de Rubis, hein<var 1D /var>? Je vous fais confiance, vous connaissez bien la région. Allez, à notre tour de prendre la merrr<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_MZHETTIA_000_004<tab>J'olhmyn!? Where are you going?
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_MZHETTIA_000_004<tab>Hééé, J'olhmyn<var 1D /var>! Ne parrrs pas sans moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_MZHETTIA_000_005<tab>(“Just compliment her like a normal person”? It's my first time seeing her wear anything but armor! What do you want from me?)
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_MZHETTIA_000_005<tab>C'est la prrremière fois que je la vois porter ce genre de tenue. Je ne suis pas habitué...

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_050<tab>Right. Now that we're here, let's split up and ask whether anyone has seen a masked Miqo'te and a “mermaid” about.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_050<tab>Nous voilà aux Batteries de Rubis. Je me demande si Nhaza'a est dans les parrrages...

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_MZHETTIA_000_051<tab>An excellent plan! Aaah, it's nice to have everything back to normal.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_MZHETTIA_000_051<tab>J'olhmyn, tu as bien fait de te rhabiller<var 1D /var>! À force, tu allais finir par t'enrrrhumer...

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_052<tab>This had better not be about my attire again... If you hadn't noticed, Alpa has been <var 1A 02 /var>kidnapped<var 1A 01 /var> by a <var 1A 02 /var>masked maniac<var 1A 01 /var>, so go find some eyewitnesses before I change my mind about drowning you!
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_052<tab>C'est trrrès aimable à toi de t'inquiéter pour ma santé, mais on a d'autres chats à fouetter. Commençons par demander aux gens du coin s'ils ont aperçu Nhaza'a et Alpa.

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_MZHETTIA_000_053<tab>I never did get to tell her that her swimsuit was fetching, but at least I managed not to make a fool of myself!
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_MZHETTIA_000_053<tab>Je crrrois qu'elle était plus aimable en bikini...

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_GUARDA03162_000_055<tab>Keep your distance─we wouldn't want you carelessly firing the cannon. Only I get to do that.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_GUARDA03162_000_055<tab><var 08 E905 ((Tu veux voir mon beau canon, ma jolie<var 1D /var>?)) ((Hé, ôte tes sales pates de mon canon<var 1D /var>!)) /var>

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_GUARDB03162_000_060<tab>Nothing to report! At least not to you─I don't even know you.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_GUARDB03162_000_060<tab>Rien à signaler<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_MZHETTIA_000_065<tab>Finding Alpa is my first priority! What, can't you tell?
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_MZHETTIA_000_065<tab>Tenez bon, Alpa<var 1D /var>! On arrive pourrr vous sauver<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_GUARDA03162_000_100<tab>A man wearing a sinister mask?
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_GUARDA03162_000_100<tab>Quoi<var 1D /var>? Tu cherches un aventurier miqo'te avec un cache-œil métallique<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_GUARDA03162_000_101<tab>He certainly hasn't passed through here. I would know─I've been looking for suspicious persons to fire at <var 1A 02 /var>all <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((day)) ((night)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((morning)) ((day)) /var>)) /var><var 1A 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_GUARDA03162_000_101<tab>Négatif, ça me dit rien. Si j'avais vu passer un type aussi louche, il aurait goûté à mon canon<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_GUARDB03162_000_102<tab>A suspicious man with a...mermaid?
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_GUARDB03162_000_102<tab>Un homme-chat avec une femme-serpent sur le dos<var 1D /var>? Ça en fait, une ménagerie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_GUARDB03162_000_103<tab>Hahaha, very funny! You Westerners and your jokes...
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_GUARDB03162_000_103<tab>Non, vous vous payez ma tête, c'est ça<var 1D /var>? Si vous pensez vraiment croiser ce genre de gus dans le coin, vous devriez allez vous rafraîchir la tête dans la Mer de Rubis<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_105<tab>Let me know if you learn anything. Unlike some people, locating Alpa is my only concern right now.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_105<tab>Venez me trrrouver si jamais vous faites une découverte intérrressante<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_MZHETTIA_000_110<tab>This is infuriating! No sign of any boats captained by brutish Miqo'te, nor whispers of one having passed by previously. Now I see why J'olhmyn is so annoyed!
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_MZHETTIA_000_110<tab>Hmmm... Où cet aven<var 16 /var>tu<var 16 /var>rrrier a-t-il bien pu emmener Alpa<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_GUARDA03162_000_175<tab>Still no sign of your masked man...
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_GUARDA03162_000_175<tab>Quoi<var 1D /var>? Tu cherches un aventurier miqo'te avec un cache-œil métallique<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_GUARDA03162_000_180<tab>But if he does pass through here, you can be certain that I'll blast him without hesitation!
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_GUARDA03162_000_180<tab>Négatif, ça me dit rien. Si j'avais vu passer un type aussi louche, il aurait goûté à mon canon<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_GUARDB03162_000_185<tab>Mermaids again?
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_GUARDB03162_000_185<tab>Un homme-chat avec une femme-serpent sur le dos<var 1D /var>? Ça en fait, une ménagerie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_GUARDB03162_000_190<tab>Hahaha, it's even funnier the second time! But seriously, get out of my sight or I'll hurl you into the ocean.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_GUARDB03162_000_190<tab>Non, vous vous payez ma tête, c'est ça<var 1D /var>? Si vous pensez vraiment croiser ce genre de gus dans le coin, vous devriez allez vous rafraîchir la tête dans la Mer de Rubis<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_150<tab>Any luck?
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_150<tab>J'espèrrre que vous avez eu plus de chance que moi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_151<tab>You too, huh? It seems we've hit a dead end here. I haven't the slightest idea what to do now, though...
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_151<tab>Rrrien de rien, hein... Ce n'est pas comme ça qu'on va retrouver Alpa.

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_MZHETTIA_000_152<tab>Waaauuugh!
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_MZHETTIA_000_152<tab>(-Voix de M'zhet Tia-)AAAAAAAAAAAH<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_153<tab>What has he gotten himself into this time? Come on, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_153<tab>... Cette voix, c'était bien celle de M'zhet<var 1D /var>!? Vite, allons voirrr<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_MZHETTIA_000_154<tab>What is the meaning of this!? First you burst out of the water like some sort of sea monster, and now you threaten me with a blade? I don't even know who you are! Or <var 1A 02 /var>what<var 1A 01 /var> you are!
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_MZHETTIA_000_154<tab>Ça va pas, la tête<var 1D /var>? D'une, vous m'avez fait peur en surrrgissant du fond de l'eau juste sous mon nez, et de deux, vous me menacez avec votre sabre sans aucune raison<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_KABUTO_000_155<tab>You know not what you stole from me, but you <var 1A 02 /var>shall<var 1A 01 /var> come to regret it! Tsukumo is more precious than any treasure. Return him at once!
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_KABUTO_000_155<tab>Tsukumo compte beaucoup plus pour moi que tous les trésors de ma tribuuuu<var 1D /var>! Rendez-le moi, ou vous allez goûter à ma laaaame<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_MZHETTIA_000_156<tab>Help me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I'm being beset by this...er, turtle? Man? Turtle man!
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_MZHETTIA_000_156<tab>M-Maître, à l'aide<var 1D /var>! Cet homme-torrrtue s'en prend à moi alors que je ne lui ai absolument rrrien fait<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_KABUTO_000_157<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!? What an odd coincidence.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_KABUTO_000_157<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, c'est bien voooous<var 1D /var>? Quelle heureuse surpriiiise<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_KABUTO_000_158<tab>Or not a coincidence at all, since you two seem to know each other. In which case, you have my apologies. I should not have drawn my blade without preamble.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_KABUTO_000_158<tab>Si vous accompagnez mon <var 08 E905 ((estimée)) ((estimé)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, ça change toooout<var 1D /var>! Veuillez m'excuser pour cette terrible mépriiiise.

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_MZHETTIA_000_159<tab>Think nothing of it! As the future leader of the M tribe, I was not at all alarmed by your sudden, menacing advance. Not in the least!
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_MZHETTIA_000_159<tab>Il n'y a pas de mal. Les amis de mon Maîtrrre sont mes amis<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_MZHETTIA_000_160<tab>I'm M'zhet Tia, by the way. And any friend of <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s is a friend of mine!
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_MZHETTIA_000_160<tab>Mon nom est M'zhet Tia, et je suis le futur Nunh de la tribu des M. Enchanté de vous rrrencontrer.

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_KABUTO_000_161<tab>I am honored to meet you. My name is Kabuto, and I lead the Blue's Divine Circle.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_KABUTO_000_161<tab>Je suis Kabuto, chef des Verts solidaaaaires. Tout le plaisir est pour mooooi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_162<tab>The name's J'olhmyn─I'm with the Velodyna Gatekeepers in Ala Mhigo. Can I ask why you were on the point of skewering M'zhet?
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_162<tab>Quant à moi, c'est J'olhmyn, de l'arrrmée de libération mhigoise. Dites-moi, Kabuto. Pourquoi vous être attaqué à M'zhet Tia<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_KABUTO_000_163<tab>Ah. In my haste, I unfortunately mistook him for a thief who recently snatched Tsukumo from my helmet.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_KABUTO_000_163<tab>Toutes mes excuses, je ne voulais pas effrayer votre amiiii. Il se trouve qu'il ressemble comme deux gouttes d'eau à l'homme qui m'a arraché mon précieux Tsukumo, d'où mon agressivitéééé...

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_MZHETTIA_000_164<tab>What, precisely, is this “Tsukumo”? You seem rather keen on getting it back.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_MZHETTIA_000_164<tab>Qu'est-ce que ce “Tsukumo”, au juste<var 1D /var>? Vous semblez y tenirrr plus que tout.

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_KABUTO_000_165<tab>Tsukumo is my dearest companion and guide, who once walked beside me as a karakuri puppet blessed with a soul. He is now present only as materia, but continues to watch over me.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_KABUTO_000_165<tab>Tsukumo est une <var 1A 02 /var>présence<var 1A 01 /var> très importante pour mooooi. C'est un tsukumogami, une divinité qui possède les objeeeets. Il est apparu à moi sous la forme d'un automate, mais aujourd'hui, c'est un joyau qu'il habiiiite.

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_166<tab>Wait, wasn't Nhaza'a holding something that looked an awful lot like materia when we saw him at the hot springs? Could that have been Tsukumo?
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_166<tab>Un <var 1A 02 /var>joyau<var 1A 01 /var>, hein... Maintenant que j'y pense, il me semble bien que Nhaza'a tenait une grrrosse pierre précieuse, dans les bains du Bokairo. Ça ne peut pas être une coïncidence...

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_167<tab>If so, it would mean that he robbed Kabuto before kidnapping Alpa─and that we almost certainly won't find him on the Ruby Sea.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_167<tab>Nhaza'a aurait donc attaqué Kabuto pour lui voler son joyau <var 1A 02 /var>avant<var 1A 01 /var> d'enlever Alpa... Dans ce cas, nous perrrdons notre temps en le cherchant sur la Mer de Rubis.

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_MZHETTIA_000_168<tab>But why not?
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_MZHETTIA_000_168<tab>Je ne suis pas sûrrr de comprendre...

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_169<tab>If it were me, I wouldn't want to risk my prize being retaken by its rightful owner─and fending Kabuto off would be a sight more difficult with Alpa in tow. I'd put money on Nhaza'a having made for land as quickly as possible.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_169<tab>Imagine-le, avec Alpa sur le dos, tomber nez à nez avec un Kabuto aussi rrremonté. Ce serait un handicap décisif, et il le sait sûrement. Non, si j'étais lui, je m'enfuirais loin d'ici. Sur le continent, parrr exemple...

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_KABUTO_000_170<tab>A reasonable conclusion. Assuming he was headed for Othard, the most direct route would have taken him through the village of Isari.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_KABUTO_000_170<tab>Vous êtes très convaincante, J'olhmyyyyn. Si notre homme a choisi la voie terrestre comme vous l'affirmez, il est fort possible qu'il ait pris la direction du village d'Isariiii.

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_171<tab>To Isari we go, then! We'll follow your lead, Kabuto.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_171<tab>Très bien, nous connaissons donc notre prrrochaine destination. Vous nous accompagnez, Kabuto<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_200<tab>What a charming little fishing village. Would that we were here for some relaxing sightseeing.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_200<tab>Voilà donc à quoi ressemble Isari. Un paisible petit village de pêcheurrrs...

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_201<tab>But we have a villain to catch and a captain to save, so let's get to it! Meet me back here once you've gathered as much information as you can.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_201<tab>Il n'y a pas de temps à perdre. Essayons de trrrouver quelqu'un qui aurait aperçu Nhaza'a.

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_KABUTO_000_205<tab>I must retrieve Tsukumo at all costs.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_KABUTO_000_205<tab>Je me demande ce que cet homme-chat a l'intention de faire avec Tsukumoooo...

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_MZHETTIA_000_210<tab>How to best explain the situation... Perhaps I should start with Alpa. So, Alpa is an Ananta─wait, so an Ananta is a sort of person, like a mermaid, but not really...
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_MZHETTIA_000_210<tab>Vous pouvez me croire, ce Nhaza'a n'est pas commode. C'est la prrremière fois que je vois quelqu'un avec un punch pareil<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_ISARIVILLAGERA03162_000_250<tab>A masked man carrying a mermaid? Frankly, I'm not even sure I could imagine such a sight, and I certainly haven't witnessed it.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_ISARIVILLAGERA03162_000_250<tab>Un aventurier miqo'te, avec un cache-œil métallique et une... <var 1A 02 /var>sirène<var 1A 01 /var> sur le dos<var 1D /var>? Euh... Désolé <var 08 E905 ((ma fille)) ((mon gars)) /var>, ça me dit rien.

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_ISARIVILLAGERA03162_000_251<tab>I did see a man with a curious mask, though. He made landfall in a small boat, and I assume departed on foot soon thereafter, as I haven't seen him since. I'd wager that he made for the Azim Steppe or Yanxia, like most who pass through here.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_ISARIVILLAGERA03162_000_251<tab>J'ai bien aperçu un Miqo'te accoster dans une petite barque, mais il était tout seul. Je l'ai plus vu après ça, donc il a sûrement poursuivi sa route vers la Steppe d'Azim, ou Yanxia.

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_ISARIVILLAGERB03162_000_252<tab>A suspicious man, and a mermaid with 'im?
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_ISARIVILLAGERB03162_000_252<tab>Un homme <var 1A 02 /var>suspect<var 1A 01 /var>, avec une <var 1A 02 /var>femme-serpent<var 1A 01 /var>...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_ISARIVILLAGERB03162_000_253<tab>No, there ain't many suspicious sorts coming 'round our little village. And you'll pardon me for sayin' so, but it don't seem likely that a mermaid would keep such company.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_ISARIVILLAGERB03162_000_253<tab>Je suis né dans ce village et j'y ai grandi. De toute ma vie, je n'ai jamais rien vu ou même entendu d'aussi ex<var 16 /var>traor<var 16 /var>di<var 16 /var>nai<var 16 /var>re<var 1D /var>! Désolé de ne pas pouvoir vous aider davantage...

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_ISARIVILLAGERC03162_000_254<tab>Hmm... I haven't seen your mystery man, but I can tell you that mermaids have been a subject of some discussion around here as of late.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_ISARIVILLAGERC03162_000_254<tab>Un aventurier qui a fait prisonnière une sirène<var 1D /var>? Ça alors, ce n'est pas banal<var 1D /var>! Vous êtes <var 08 E905 ((sûre)) ((sûr)) /var> que vous n'avez pas inventé tout ça<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_ISARIVILLAGERC03162_100_254<tab>You see, local legend has it that somewhere out there, far from the sight and grasp of the ordinary man, are what we Hingans call the “Three Wonders,” mermaid's flesh being one. It is said to grant life eternal, be that for better or for worse.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_ISARIVILLAGERC03162_100_254<tab>D'ailleurs, cette histoire me fait penser aux fameux “trésors légendaires” de Kugane. Ils sont au nombre de trois, et l'un d'eux serait un morceau de chair de sirène...

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_ISARIVILLAGERC03162_000_255<tab>A few moons past, a young lady born to one of Kugane's oldest─and wealthiest─families proclaimed that, should any gentleman presume to ask for her hand in marriage, she would accept nothing less than all Three Wonders as a dowry.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_ISARIVILLAGERC03162_000_255<tab>J'ai entendu il y a peu qu'une certaine jeune fille noble de la ville exigerait de ses prétendants qu'ils lui fassent cadeau non pas d'un de ces trésors, mais carrément des trois à la fois pour l'épouser<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_ISARIVILLAGERC03162_000_256<tab>It's a fool's errand, certain enough─we Hingans love our faerie stories as well as any folk, but we know the Three Wonders are no more than fantasy. You have to admire her clever ploy to remain unwed, though, which is why it's the talk of the land.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_ISARIVILLAGERC03162_000_256<tab>Personne ne sait si ces reliques existent vraiment, et c'est bien pour ça qu'on les qualifie de <var 1A 02 /var>légendaires<var 1A 01 /var>. Si vous voulez mon avis, cette petite n'a pas vraiment envie de se marier...

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_260<tab>We need to cast a wide net, so let's spread out and speak to everyone. Make sure to really grill the local fishermen.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_260<tab>Retrouvons-nous sur la plage lorsque nous aurrrons fini d'interroger les villageois, d'accord<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_300<tab>Now that we're all back, let's share what we've learned. Hopefully between the four of us we'll have heard enough to go on.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_300<tab>Alorrrs, est-ce que vous avez découvert quelque chose d'intéressant<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_301<tab>Hmm, so though Nhaza'a was indeed sighted, no one can confirm which direction he departed in. And, if your source is correct, Alpa is no longer with him. Did he stash her somewhere before landing in Isari? And where is he now?
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_301<tab>Un villageois aurait donc aperçu Nhaza'a passer par ici, mais sans Alpa<var 1D /var>? Soit il s'est débarrassé d'elle, ce qui m'étonnerait, soit il l'a enfermée quelque parrrt avant de débarquer à Isari...

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_KABUTO_000_302<tab>The Three Wonders may provide a clue. According to folklore, the treasures are Merflesh, the Jewel of Fair Souls, and the Philosopher's Fin.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_KABUTO_000_302<tab>Et s'il y avait un rapport avec les trois trésors légendaires de Kuganeeee<var 1D /var>? Outre la chair de sirène, il s'agirait d'une “nageoire de sage” et d'un “joyau habitéééé”... Quiconque vivant en Hingashi en a déjà entendu parleeeer.

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_303<tab>I shudder to think of the young lady being forced to marry Nhaza'a of all people, but based on his thefts so far, it does seem like he is collecting the Wonders─or treasures with passing similarity to them, at least.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_303<tab>Je ne sais pas si ce roublard de Nhaza'a s'est mis en tête d'épouser cette jeune noble, mais ce qui est sûr, c'est qu'il cherche à réunir ces trrrois trésors.

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_KABUTO_000_304<tab>Indeed. If Tsukumo is his substitute for the Jewel of Fair Souls, and your Alpa is meant to be the source of Merflesh, that leaves only one.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_KABUTO_000_304<tab>Je n'y avais jamais réfléchi, mais il est fort possible que mon Tsukumo soit ce “joyau habitéééé”. Quant à votre amie, peut-être qu'elle a été enlevée pour faire office de chair de sirèèèène<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_MZHETTIA_000_305<tab>“Flesh” certainly implies a level of dismemberment that I'm not comfortable with. We have to stop him!
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_MZHETTIA_000_305<tab>Mais c'est terrible<var 1D /var>! À l'heurrre où nous parlons, Alpa a sûrement déjà été découpée en morrrceaux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_306<tab>Yes, I realize that! If you have any brilliant ideas as to <var 1A 02 /var>how<var 1A 01 /var>, now's the time─we can't allow him to stay one step ahead of us.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_JOLHMYN_000_306<tab>Ne parle pas de malheurrr, enfin<var 1D /var>! Nous allons retrouver notre capitaine avant qu'il ne lui arrive quoi que ce soit<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_ISARIVILLAGERA03162_000_310<tab>Assuming your masked man is the same one I saw, he likely headed for the Azim Steppe or Yanxia.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_ISARIVILLAGERA03162_000_310<tab>Un aventurier miqo'te, avec un cache-œil métallique et une... <var 1A 02 /var>sirène<var 1A 01 /var> sur le dos<var 1D /var>? Euh... Désolé <var 08 E905 ((ma fille)) ((mon gars)) /var>, ça me dit rien.

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_ISARIVILLAGERA03162_000_315<tab>I wish he'd had the mermaid with him, too─that must have been a sight to see!
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_ISARIVILLAGERA03162_000_315<tab>J'ai bien aperçu un Miqo'te accoster dans une petite barque, mais il était tout seul. Je l'ai plus vu après ça, donc il a sûrement poursuivi sa route vers la Steppe d'Azim, ou Yanxia.

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_ISARIVILLAGERB03162_000_320<tab>Nope, I ain't never in my life seen a man like the one in your tale. Sounds right unsavory.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_ISARIVILLAGERB03162_000_320<tab>Un homme <var 1A 02 /var>suspect<var 1A 01 /var>, avec une <var 1A 02 /var>femme-serpent<var 1A 01 /var>...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_ISARIVILLAGERB03162_000_325<tab>An' the thought of a mermaid bein' with him is downright unbelievable! They ain't about to hang around with riffraff.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_ISARIVILLAGERB03162_000_325<tab>Je suis né dans ce village et j'y ai grandi. De toute ma vie, je n'ai jamais rien vu ou même entendu d'aussi ex<var 16 /var>traor<var 16 /var>di<var 16 /var>nai<var 16 /var>re<var 1D /var>! Désolé de ne pas pouvoir vous aider davantage...

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_ISARIVILLAGERC03162_000_330<tab>Hm? Oh, the young lady?
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_ISARIVILLAGERC03162_000_330<tab>Un aventurier qui a fait prisonnière une sirène<var 1D /var>? Ça alors, ce n'est pas banal<var 1D /var>! Vous êtes <var 08 E905 ((sûre)) ((sûr)) /var> que vous n'avez pas inventé tout ça<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_ISARIVILLAGERC03162_100_330<tab>I hear she is a maiden of extraordinary beauty, born into wealth and power. And if the tales of her setting her suitors to such an impossible task are true, she's sharp as they come, as well.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_ISARIVILLAGERC03162_100_330<tab>D'ailleurs, cette histoire me fait penser aux fameux “trésors légendaires” de Kugane. Ils sont au nombre de trois, et l'un d'eux serait un morceau de chair de sirène...

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_ISARIVILLAGERC03162_000_335<tab>It makes no difference, though. The Three Wonders are the stuff of legend, and legend alone, so none will have her hand, no matter how they pine.
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_ISARIVILLAGERC03162_000_335<tab>J'ai entendu il y a peu qu'une certaine jeune fille noble de la ville exigerait de ses prétendants qu'ils lui fassent cadeau non pas d'un de ces trésors, mais carrément des trois à la fois pour l'épouser<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_ISARIVILLAGERC03162_000_340<tab>So don't get any ideas, you hear?
target: TEXT_BANALL220_03162_ISARIVILLAGERC03162_000_340<tab>Personne ne sait si ces reliques existent vraiment, et c'est bien pour ça qu'on les qualifie de <var 1A 02 /var>légendaires<var 1A 01 /var>. Si vous voulez mon avis, cette petite n'a pas vraiment envie de se marier...
